casebody.data:
LETENDRE
v.
CURRITUCK COUNTY 178P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 19, 2018 Donald I. McRee, Jr., Currituck County Attorney, for Currituck County (North Carolina). Jonathan E. Hall, Attorney at Law, Michael Joseph Crook, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Gregory E. Wills, Attorney at Law, Point Harbor, Jamie S. Schwedler, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for LeTendre, Elizabeth E.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of June 2018 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of June 2018."
